last_episode_to_air.overview: Jack Whitehall and his father Michael look back at some of the highlights of the series.

name: Backchat with Jack Whitehall and His Dad
original_name: Backchat with Jack Whitehall and His Dad
overview: Backchat is an entertainment show hosted by Jack Whitehall, but he's brought his father, Michael, along too. Each week Jack will be inviting big celebrity names along for a chat and sketches. Unfortunately his dad will also be throwing in his own observations and questions, as well as giving Jack a telling off for his interview manner. Join the fun as Whitehall junior and senior meet some brilliant celebrity guests in this very unique new comedy show.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Jack Whitehall and his dad are joined by exclusive guests Jeremy Paxman and Danny Dyer.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Jack and Michael meet Gary Lineker and Geordie Shore's Holly Hagan, Marnie Simpson and Scott Timlin.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Jack and Michael meet The Apprentice's Nick Hewer and UK grime sensation Lethal Bizzle.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Guests on the sofa are Bear Grylls, Rylan Clark and Louie Spence.

episodes.name: Christmas Special
episodes.overview: Join Jack Whitehall and his real father Michael as they invite a whole host of Christmas guests to join them for this festive edition of their chat show, including comedian Lee Mack and the cast of Bad Education.

episodes.name: New Year Compilation
episodes.overview: Jack Whitehall and his father Michael look back at some of the series highlights.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Jack Whitehall embraces all things musical with comedy actor and author David Walliams and West End star and broadcaster Michael Ball.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: The stand-up and his father Michael are joined on their comedy chat show by comedian and Never Mind the Buzzcocks captain Noel Fielding and former deputy prime minister John Prescott.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: The stand-up and his father Michael are joined on their comedy chat show by supergroup McBusted and television presenter Richard Osman.

episodes.name: Compilation
episodes.overview: Jack Whitehall and his father Michael look back at some of the highlights of the series.
